displayName: My goal is to support the community and continue creating more useful tools. If these automations prove to be very helpful to you, or if you see value in what I'm sharing, any donation, no matter how small, is welcome and will allow me to dedicate more time and resources to building new templates and contributing more solutions. https://donate.stripe.com/bJe6oGaaQ9JC1jf15gdwc01 Thank you for your interest, and I hope you find them very useful.
